alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jones, southeastern Craven, east central Onslow and southwestern Carteret Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Broad Creek, or near Newport, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Havelock, Morehead City, Newport, Stella, Swansboro, Cape Carteret, Pine Knoll Shores, Harlowe, Silverdale, Broad Creek, Wildwood, Kuhns, Peletier, Bogue, North Harlowe, Hammocks Beach, Cherry Branch Ferry Terminal, Oceana Pier, Bogue Inlet Pier, and Hammocks Beach State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret
